div.p: CHAMBERLAIN, SOUTH DAKOTA, SOCCER CLUB FOR RAISING MONEY
FOR THE VETERANS FAMILY. MY COLUMN THIS WEEK ABOUT HOW
THEY ARE DEPENDENT ON THE MACHINES.
THEY CAN’T STOP. THEY CAN’T STOP.
YOU CAN READ THE COLUMN ON BILL O’REILLY.COM.
HOW MUCH MONEY DO YOU SPEND ON THE NET INCLUDING E-MAIL AND
TEXTING. 46%, BETWEEN ONE AND THREE
HOURS. 15% MORE THAN THREE HOURS.
THERE YOU GO. CLOSE TO 20,000 OF YOU
RESPONDED. A NEW BOOK OUT CALLED "ONE DAY
CONTRACT" WRITTEN BY THE LEGENDARY BASKETBALL COACH RICK

THEY TAKE OUT THEIR PHONE WHEN THEY SHOULD SAY YOU HAVE MY

IF THEY ARE DISTRACTED BY THEIR BLACKBERRY OR E-MAIL WHILE

HAVING GREAT DIALOGUE AND THE KIDS ARE UNDERNEATH TEXTING.
>> CHECK OUT PITINO’S BOOK. TRY TO LIMIT YOUR OWN INTERNET
USE. LIMIT IT.
